query: MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic gravel race Beechworth

videos.title: Beechworth Granite Classic 2023 - Official recap
videos.description:
A recap of the 2023 MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic.
On Sat April 28, Over 850 riders took to the dirt roads surrounding Beechworth in the Victorian High Country region of Australia.

Video by Riley Matthews

videos.title: Beechworth Granite Classic 2025 - Official Recap
videos.description:
A recap of the 2025 MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic.
On Sat April 5, 1500 riders took to the dirt roads surrounding Beechworth in the Victorian High Country region of Australia.

videos.title: How to Prepare for GRAVEL RACING, Episode 1: Beechworth Granite Classic
videos.description:
Join Coach Michelle on here journey to the Australian Gravel Championships in Tasmania. This episode gives some tips and guidance on how to prepare for gravel racing as Michelle rides the Beechworth Granite Classic in Victoria. 

Training Plans: https://www.pedalaction.com.au/trainingplans

videos.title: Surviving the Sandy 115km: 2024 Beechworth Granite Classic
videos.description:
Last weekend's 2024 Beechworth Granite Classic was an unforgettable adventure! I tackled the challenging 115km route filled with dust and sand, a stark contrast to last year's muddy conditions. Experience every thrilling and gritty moment with me in this highlight video!

🚴‍♂️ Video Highlights:
- A full recap of the 115km route at the Beechworth Granite Classic.
- My personal experience with the tough conditions
- An unexpected crash at 66km. See how I managed and what happened next.

🌟 Why You Should Watch:
- Whether you're a seasoned gravel rider or just love watching cycling adventures, this video has something for everyone.
- Get insights into handling unexpected situations and the spirit of perseverance in extreme sports.

👍 Like, Subscribe, and Hit the Bell for more cycling stories and extreme sport adventures. Comment below your own experiences or if you’ve ever faced similar challenges!

#BeechworthGraniteClassic #GravelRide #CyclingCrash #ExtremeSports #CyclingAdventure #OutdoorChallenge

--------------------- Links from this video ----------------------
Route: https://ridewithgps.com/trips/166916843
Beechworth Granite classic: https://beechworthgraniteclassic.com.au/

----------------------------- Music -----------------------------
Main: Leave You Out By Alex Ansaldi

---------------------------- My Gear ----------------------------
Cameras: DJI Action 4, DJI Mini 3 Pro, Sony Alpha A7C
Cycling Kits: Pedal Mafia, Ostroy, Maap, Attaquer, POC, Oakley, Bont Cycling
Bikes:
Road: Specialized Tarmac SL6
Gravel: Focus Atlas 8.9
Love Hunt Bike Wheels!

---------------------------- Connect ----------------------------
Strava - http://bit.ly/lkd_strava
Instagram - http://bit.ly/lkd_instagram
website - https://robens.au/

videos.title: Beechworth Granite Classic 2022 - Official Recap
videos.description:
A recap of the 2022 MAAP Beechworth Granite Classic.
Over 550 riders took to the dirt roads surrounding Beechworth in the Victorian High Country region of Australia.

Video -  Riley Matthews
Music - 'Dust - Breaks Edit' by Andras
